title: El Salvador launches exclusive Bitcoin-driven Freedom Visa with Tether
description:
El Salvador, in partnership with Tether, has launched a “Freedom Visa Program.” Similar to Portugal’s Golden Visa, which was scrapped earlier this year, the program encourages Bitcoin investors to become citizens of the country. El Salvador’s initiative offers a unique opportunity for 1,000 individuals annually to partake in the nation’s economic renaissance, which is deeply […]

The post El Salvador launches exclusive Bitcoin-driven Freedom Visa with Tether appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Nigerian Crypto Firm Bitmama to Pay $1 Million for Startup That Raised $3 Million in February
description: The Nigerian crypto platform Bitmama is reportedly set to acquire the African remittances startup Payday for $1 million. Reports of Payday’s acquisition come almost a year after the startup raised $3 million in a funding round. Bitmama’s Pivot From Crypto The Nigerian crypto platform Bitmama is set to acquire the cross-border payment startup Payday for […]

title: Kazakhstan blocks 980 crypto exchanges for non-compliance
description: In a significant regulatory move, Kazakhstan’s Financial Monitoring Agency (AFM) has blocked nearly a thousand cryptocurrency exchanges operating without proper registration. This action underscores the country’s commitment to regulating the digital currency market. Government crackdown on unregistered exchanges The AFM’s recent measures, detailed in a December 7 press release, highlight its stringent approach to cryptocurrency ... Read more

title: Sui Network Disavows Alleged Ties to ‘Sui Mermaid’ Project Amid Branding Controversy
description: In a recent and unexpected turn of events, Sui Network, a major player in the tech industry, has forcefully denied any association with the ‘Sui Mermaid’ or ‘Mermaid’ project. The unfolding controversy revolves around false claims made by the latter, asserting a connection with the esteemed Sui Foundation. Sui Network, in response, has issued a ... Read more

title: Swiss arm of BBVA bank taps Ripple-owned Metaco for crypto custody
description: BBVA Switzerland has migrated its crypto custody services to Ripple-owned infrastructure provider Metaco. title: Fidelity spot Bitcoin ETF listed on DTCC
description: Fidelity’s Wise Origin spot Bitcoin ETF is listed on the Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation (DTCC) under the ticker symbol FBTC. The spot Bitcoin ETF was listed by DTCC, which is engaged in clearing transactions. It provides post-trade clearance, settlement,…

title: Terra’s Co-Founder Do Kwon Facing Extradition Nightmare to the U.S.
description: Former Terraform Labs CEO set to be extradited to the US after a private comment by Montenegro’s Justice Minister. title: Jito (JTO) Price Surges On Airdrop, CEX Listings: Will The Hype Last?
description:
The price of Jito (JTO) pumped to $3.00 within 24 hours after the Liquid Staking Token launched on December 7. According to CoinMarketCap, the price was up 84.96% since the token’s launch and listing on major exchanges. But besides the price increase, Jito had a lot of hype around its introduction.
